name: Berries Market
address: 820 Wharncliffe Rd S #4, London, ON N6J 2N2
hours: Mon-Sat: 9 AM - 9 PM, Sun: 9 AM - 7 PM
description: Your Mediterranean Grocery and Halal Foods Destination in London Ontario. Offers fresh produce, halal meats, bakery delights, and authentic Middle Eastern groceries.

name: Feliza African Grocery & Beauty Store
address: 1203 Commissioners Rd E, London, ON N5Z 4W1
description: Shop the best in African and Caribbean groceries, beauty products, household items, and personal care. Find yam flour, egusi, and fresh produce.

name: H Mart - Yonge St.
address: 5320 Yonge St, North York, ON M2N 5P9
description: Popular Korean and Asian grocery chain offering a wide selection of fresh produce, meats, seafood, and imported goods.

name: Yummy Market - North York
address: 1390 Major Mackenzie Dr W, Maple, ON L6A 4H6
description: A European food experience with fresh-baked breads, scratch-made prepared foods, deli, and thousands of gourmet groceries from Europe and worldwide.

name: Lucky Supermarket - Winnipeg
address: 1055 St James St, Winnipeg, MB R3H 1B1
description: A diverse array of Asian products from countries like Vietnam, China, the Philippines, Japan, Korea, Thailand, and beyond.

name: Young's Market - McPhillips
hours: Mon-Sat: 9 AM - 8 PM, Sun: 9 AM - 6 PM
description: Stocks essential ethnic ingredients & housewares. Aims to deliver outstanding value with great savings and in-store specials.

name: Fresh is Best on Broadway
hours: Mon-Sat: 10 AM - 7 PM, Sun: 11 AM - 6 PM
description: A premium Latin foods market specializing in Mexican and Latin American food products and a wide selection of local and imported hot sauces.

name: Persia Foods - West Broadway
description: Family-run chain offering fresh, healthy, and ethnically diverse foods at competitive prices, creating a vibrant, culturally rich shopping experience.

name: Saskatoon Deshi Supermarket
description: Your premier destination for authentic South Asian (Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka), Middle East, and African groceries. Offers weekly fresh vegetables from Bangladesh and 100% halal products.

name: Bombay Spices - Saskatoon
description: Offers ethnic, high-quality Indian and South Asian grocery items at competitive prices, aiming for customer loyalty.

name: Nunu Ethiopian Fusion
address: 1248 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M6J 1J5
description: Modern Ethiopian fusion restaurant with traditional coffee ceremonies, known for its flavorful platters and vegan options. Offers an immersive cultural dining experience.

name: Naan Kabob - Bayview
description: Beloved Afghan restaurant known for authentic, succulent kabobs, rich stews, and freshly baked naan. Offers halal meat and several vegetarian dishes.

name: Bonjour Vietnam Bistro
description: A MICHELIN Guide recognized bistro offering authentic Vietnamese fare, including soul-warming pho and bun bo hue. Features a lively atmosphere and vegetarian options.

name: Kook Korean BBQ
description: Offers an exciting Korean BBQ experience with premium meats and advanced smokeless grills. Known for its authentic flavors and unique, element-themed interior design.

name: La Toxica
description: A popular spot known for serving some of the best authentic Mexican tacos in Montreal. Offers traditional street food with vegetarian and vegan options.

name: Tsukuyomi Ramen
description: A local Montreal gem specializing in authentic Japanese ramen with homemade, rich tonkotsu broth. Also offers seafood broth options and satisfying vegan choices.

name: Masala Bhavan Express
address: 8528 Macleod Trail SE, Calgary, AB T2H 0M5
description: A South Indian cuisine restaurant in Calgary, operated by a Red Seal chef. Known for its authentic flavors and vegetarian options.

name: Pampa Brazilian Steakhouse
hours: Brunch: Weekends & holidays 11 AM - 2 PM; Dinner: Mon-Thu 4:30 PM - 9 PM, Fri-Sat 4 PM - 9:30 PM, Sun 4 PM - 8 PM
description: An authentic Brazilian steakhouse experience where perfectly prepared meats are carved table-side, complemented by an endless spread of hot and cold accompaniments.

name: Amaleena Restaurant
description: A delightful culinary experience in Edmonton specializing in a fusion of Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisines. Known for tender kebabs, flavorful falafels, and fresh pita.

name: Yiannis Taverna
hours: Tue-Thu: 11:30 AM - 10 PM, Fri-Sat: 11:30 AM - 11 PM, Sun: 5 PM - 9 PM, Mon: 5 PM - 10 PM
description: Edmonton's original Greek restaurant serving authentic Greek recipes in a historical ambiance. Features traditional dancers on Friday and Saturday evenings.

name: North & Navy
description: Prides itself on recreating the tastes of northern Italy in a rustic dining room. Featured on Canada's 100 Best Restaurants list for its authentic Italian dishes.

name: A La Istanbul
hours: Mon-Thu: 11 AM - 10:30 PM, Fri: 11 AM - 11 PM, Sat: 10 AM - 11 PM, Sun: 10 AM - 10:30 PM
description: An authentic Turkish restaurant in Ottawa, offering a delightful culinary journey through traditional Turkish cuisine. Open daily with extensive hours.

name: Cha Baa Thai Restaurant
description: Brings the authentic flavors of Thailand to Halifax. Known for its vibrant and flavorful dishes, including Pad Thai, Green Curry, and Tom Yum Soup, in an inviting atmosphere.

name: Triniman Kitchen
description: A culinary gem bringing the vibrant flavors of the Caribbean to London, ON. Specializes in authentic Trinbagonian cuisine, including mouth-watering roti, curries, and jerk chicken.

name: Max's Restaurant - Winnipeg
address: 1255 St James St, Winnipeg, MB R3H 0J8
hours: Mon-Thu: 11 AM - 8 PM, Fri-Sun: 11 AM - 9 PM
description: Home of authentic Filipino fried chicken, offering a wide array of traditional Filipino dishes. A popular spot for family gatherings and events.
